sys_remote_update_set.description:
CONTENT Updates 2 system properties that define how ESLint is configured for the script editor in ServiceNow. One system property defines ESLint for EcmaScript 5 while the second for EcmaScript 12. These configurations were extended with additional rules related to best practices and coding style guidelines most widely used in Javascript like Prettier and Airbnb.
For more details: https://github.com/DominikSimunek/sn-eslint-configuration/tree/main
sys_remote_update_set.name: DominikSimunek-ESLintConfigurationForServiceNow-v1.0

sys_update_xml.name: sys_properties_9bebca14731023001c233096fbf6a753
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_properties"><sys_properties action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><choices/><description>ESlint configuration</description><ignore_cache>false</ignore_cache><is_private>false</is_private><name>glide.ui.syntax_editor.linter.eslint_config</name><read_roles/><suffix/><sys_class_name>sys_properties</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2018-08-29 09:43:08</sys_created_on><sys_id>9bebca14731023001c233096fbf6a753</sys_id><sys_mod_count>4</sys_mod_count><sys_name>glide.ui.syntax_editor.linter.eslint_config</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Syntax Editor" source="com.glide.syntax_editor">1054b8a49921221008ddd351c8920a8b</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_properties_9bebca14731023001c233096fbf6a753</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>dominik@dominiksimunek.com</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2025-08-03 08:14:31</sys_updated_on><type>string</type><value>{
    "parserOptions": {
        "ecmaVersion": 5
    },
    "rules": {
        "constructor-super": "warn",
        "no-case-declarations": "warn",
        "no-class-assign": "warn",
        "no-compare-neg-zero": "warn",
        "no-cond-assign": "warn",
        "no-const-assign": "warn",
        "no-constant-condition": "warn",
        "no-control-regex": "warn",
        "no-debugger": "warn",
        "no-delete-var": "warn",
        "no-dupe-args": "warn",
        "no-dupe-class-members": "warn",
        "no-dupe-keys": "warn",
        "no-duplicate-case": "warn",
        "no-empty-character-class": "warn",
        "no-empty-pattern": "warn",
        "no-empty": ["warn", { "allowEmptyCatch": true }],
        "no-ex-assign": "warn",
        "no-extra-boolean-cast": "warn",
        "no-extra-semi": "warn",
        "semi": "warn",
        "no-fallthrough": "warn",
        "no-func-assign": "warn",
        "no-global-assign": "warn",
        "no-inner-declarations": "warn",
        "no-invalid-regexp": "warn",
        "no-irregular-whitespace": "warn",
        "no-mixed-spaces-and-tabs": "warn",
        "no-new-symbol": "warn",
        "no-obj-calls": "warn",
        "no-octal": "warn",
        "no-redeclare": "warn",
        "no-regex-spaces": "warn",
        "no-self-assign": "warn",
        "no-sparse-arrays": "warn",
        "no-this-before-super": "warn",
        "no-undef": "off",
        "no-unexpected-multiline": "warn",
        "no-unreachable": "warn",
        "no-unsafe-finally": "warn",
        "no-unsafe-negation": "warn",
        "no-unused-labels": "warn",
        "no-unused-vars": "off",
        "no-useless-escape": "warn",
        "require-yield": "warn",
        "use-isnan": "warn",
        "valid-typeof": "warn",
        "array-bracket-spacing": ["warn", "never"],
        "brace-style": "warn",
        "camelcase": ["warn", {"properties": "never", "allow": ["g_form", "g_list", "g_scratchpad", "g_menu", "g_user", "g_response", "g_request", "g_lang", "g_service_catalog", "g_processor"]}],
        "comma-spacing": "warn",
        "comma-style": "warn",
        "computed-property-spacing": "warn",
        "curly": ["warn", "multi-line"],
        "func-call-spacing": ["warn", "never"],
        "key-spacing": "warn",
        "keyword-spacing": "warn",
        "lines-around-comment": "warn",
        "new-cap": "error",
        "new-parens": "error",
        "no-array-constructor": "error",
        "no-console": "warn",
        "no-eval": "error",
        "no-extend-native": "error",
        "no-floating-decimal": "warn",
        "no-implied-eval": "error",
        "no-lonely-if": "warn",
        "no-multi-spaces": "warn",
        "no-multiple-empty-lines": "warn",
        "no-nested-ternary": "error",
        "no-new-object": "error",
        "no-self-compare": "warn",
        "no-unneeded-ternary": "warn",
        "no-whitespace-before-property": "warn",
        "no-with": "error",
        "space-before-blocks": "warn",
        "space-infix-ops": "warn"
    }
}</value><write_roles/></sys_properties><sys_translated_text action="delete_multiple" query="documentkey=9bebca14731023001c233096fbf6a753"/></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sys_properties_e6b79f250f332010b5a805c0ff767e7e
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_properties"><sys_properties action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><choices/><description>ESlint configuration for ECMAScript 2021 (ES12)</description><ignore_cache>false</ignore_cache><is_private>false</is_private><name>glide.ui.syntax_editor.linter.eslint_config.ecmascript2021</name><read_roles/><suffix/><sys_class_name>sys_properties</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2021-04-28 20:49:38</sys_created_on><sys_id>e6b79f250f332010b5a805c0ff767e7e</sys_id><sys_mod_count>3</sys_mod_count><sys_name>glide.ui.syntax_editor.linter.eslint_config.ecmascript2021</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Syntax Editor" source="com.glide.syntax_editor">1054b8a49921221008ddd351c8920a8b</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_properties_e6b79f250f332010b5a805c0ff767e7e</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>dominik@dominiksimunek.com</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2025-08-03 08:14:47</sys_updated_on><type>string</type><value>{
    "parserOptions": {
        "ecmaVersion": 12
    },
    "rules": {
        "sn-no-proxies": "warn",
        "constructor-super": "warn",
        "no-case-declarations": "warn",
        "no-class-assign": "warn",
        "no-compare-neg-zero": "warn",
        "no-cond-assign": "warn",
        "no-const-assign": "warn",

        "no-debugger": "warn",

        "no-ex-assign": "warn",
        "no-extra-boolean-cast": "warn",
        "no-extra-semi": "warn",
        "semi": "warn",
        "no-fallthrough": "warn",
        "no-func-assign": "warn",
        "no-global-assign": "warn",
        "no-inner-declarations": "warn",
        "no-invalid-regexp": "warn",
        "no-irregular-whitespace": "warn",
        "no-mixed-spaces-and-tabs": "warn",
        "no-new-symbol": "warn",
        "no-obj-calls": "warn",
        "no-octal": "warn",
        "no-redeclare": "warn",
        "no-regex-spaces": "warn",
        "no-self-assign": "warn",
        "no-sparse-arrays": "warn",
        "no-this-before-super": "warn",
        "no-undef": "off",
        "no-unexpected-multiline": "warn",
        "no-unreachable": "warn",
        "no-unsafe-finally": "warn",
        "no-unsafe-negation": "warn",
        "no-unused-labels": "warn",
        "no-unused-vars": "off",
        "no-useless-escape": "warn",
        "require-yield": "warn",
        "use-isnan": "warn",
        "valid-typeof": "warn",
        "array-bracket-spacing": ["warn", "never"],
        "brace-style": "warn",
        "camelcase": ["warn", {"properties": "never", "allow": ["g_form", "g_list", "g_scratchpad", "g_menu", "g_user", "g_response", "g_request", "g_lang", "g_service_catalog", "g_processor"]}],
        "comma-spacing": "warn",
        "comma-style": "warn",
        "computed-property-spacing": "warn",
        "curly": ["warn", "multi-line"],
        "func-call-spacing": ["warn", "never"],
        "key-spacing": "warn",
        "keyword-spacing": "warn",
        "lines-around-comment": "warn",
        "new-cap": "error",
        "new-parens": "error",
        "no-array-constructor": "error",
        "no-console": "warn",
        "no-eval": "error",
        "no-extend-native": "error",
        "no-floating-decimal": "warn",
        "no-implied-eval": "error",
        "no-lonely-if": "warn",
        "no-multi-spaces": "warn",
        "no-multiple-empty-lines": "warn",
        "no-nested-ternary": "error",
        "no-new-object": "error",
        "no-self-compare": "warn",
        "no-unneeded-ternary": "warn",
        "no-whitespace-before-property": "warn",
        "no-with": "error",
        "space-before-blocks": "warn",
        "space-infix-ops": "warn"
    }
}</value><write_roles/></sys_properties><sys_translated_text action="delete_multiple" query="documentkey=e6b79f250f332010b5a805c0ff767e7e"/></record_update>
